cmdstats.system: things which control logic in within the mod.
cmdstats.system.grammar: things which control the grammar'd output of feedback's component parts
cmdstats.system.grammar.gender_: things which control the gender of nouns thing
everything else that can't be so easily conjugated
cmdstats.system.grammar.plurality: Having to do with how many of a thing there are
cmdstats.feedback: For determining the final output past logic
cmdstats.feedback.format: putting all the building blocks together
cmdstats.feedback.format.project.list.pa: %s also has %s inactive projects. They are:%s
cmdstats.feedback.format.project.start.n: No players were added to the %s project

cmdstats.feedback.format.project.pause.g: Paused %s players' participation in the %s project. Those players are:%s

cmdstats.feedback.error.project.reserved: The string "%s" is reserved and cannot be used as a project name.
cmdstats.feedback.error.project.not_foun: %s is not a part of %s project.
cmdstats.feedback.error.project.unspecif: %s an expected but unspecified error occured.
